channel.title: Help disable the feature that kicks when clicking to fast
channel.description: ive heard that theres a code that kicks you for clicking to fast to stop autoers but can you tell me how to disable it, cause people keep getting pissed off everytime they click to fast on my server and it kicks them

item.title: Help disable the feature that kicks when clicking to fast
item.dc:creator: @MastaRiddik MastaRiddik
item.description:
@MastaRiddik wrote:

im keeping it in i just changed it so i can click faster

Read full topic

item.title: Help disable the feature that kicks when clicking to fast
item.dc:creator: @MastaRiddik MastaRiddik
item.description:
@MastaRiddik wrote:

this code was located in the boolean process

} if (healingTimer > 0) { healingTimer -= 1; } if (actionAmount < 0) { actionAmount = 0; < and this is what you proly want right here } if (actionTimer > 0) { actionTimer -= 1; } \/ just change this to 99999 or something to keep from d/c if click to fast if (actionAmount > 4) { sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!"); misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it"); disconnected = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: Help disable the feature that kicks when clicking to fast
